title: CIDR Subnet Splitter
description: Split a network into equal child subnets by count or target prefix length.

input.parentCIDRTooltip: Enter IPv4 or IPv6 network in CIDR notation (e.g., 192.168.1.0/24)
input.subnetCountTooltip: How many equal subnets to create (will be rounded to nearest power of 2)
input.targetPrefixTooltip: The prefix length for child subnets (must be larger than parent prefix)

results.title: Split Results
results.parentNetworkTooltip: The original network that was split
results.childPrefixTooltip: Prefix length of each child subnet
results.addressesPerChildTooltip: Total IP addresses in each child subnet
results.utilizationTooltip: Percentage of parent network's address space used
